intro: ^! How's it going? Excited for the weekend?"

s: ^Yes! I just got us a cotton candy machine, and I am going to basically drown in it. Bounce house, djs...it's all coming together.
^I got a cotton candy machine, so I'm stoked. Oh, I met up with Elisa and Mrs. Lee. I have some ideas for your new initiative.
^I. Am. Ready. Oh, you know what? I have some information for you.

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Oh, you're adding cotton candy to your list of skills eh? So bread, boiling water, and cotton candy? Sounds like reality tv show ingredients."

s: ^You know what? That's messed up! I may not cook well, but I'm learning, hah!
^I may not be able to cook a 5 star meal, but I do have some recommendations for you.

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "You know I’m playing. You have information? For the initiative? What did you find out?"

s: ^Well, I met up with Elisa and Mrs. Lee and they taught me a lot. Here's what I learned.
^I learned a lot by talking to Mrs. Lee and Elisa. They know so much!

ReadyToSolve: ^Rashad?Neutral "I'm not surprised. Elisa is really smart and thoughtful, and Mrs. Lee has a close relationship with both Eddie and Lila. She's helped me out many times. What did you find out?"

s: ^Actually, let me check my notes again. I want to make sure what they said is captured correctly.

GoodSolution: ^Rashad?Smiling "Wow. This is great information. I had an idea that both teens and seniors could benefit from this, but I didn't know how much. Thank you so much for looking into this,

s: ^Sweet! I'm so happy I could help Rashad. Let me know if you need anything else!
^I knew talking to Mrs. Lee and Elisa about this was the right move. Let me know how I can help push this forward!

BadSolution: ^Rashad?Neutral "Oh. Well, that's kind of not what I was looking for. Did they say anything else? I want to know how it benefits seniors and teens."

s: ^Hmm. Wait a second, let me try that again.
^Actually, you're right. Let me look at my notes again and get back to you.

SolvedGoodbye: ^Rashad?Smiling "I'm going to go email Elisa and Mrs. Lee right now and see if they’d be interested in talking more, and if any of their friends would be willing to sign up!"
^Rashad?Smiling "Even if they don't have time to participate, I know I can follow up with them to get their insight. Thanks for helping me figure out the right path,
^Rashad?Smiling "You've been such a great help this week. I'm sure your gourmet cotton candy will be fire. See you!"

s: ^Uh, please don't say that. I’d – I burn the cotton candy. I'll never be allowed near a kitchen. See you soon, though!
^If I burn cotton candy no one will let me live it down, bro. Hah. But I'll see you soon. Happy to help.

TempGoodbye: ^Rashad?Neutral "Oh, okay. Sounds like a plan. I'll go run a quick errand, catch you later?"

s: ^Ok, I'll be back when I know more. See you soon!
